channel.title: CiTR -- Radio Zero
channel.description: Hosted by Tyler Fedchuk and Paul Devro we play an international mix of super-fresh weekend party jams from new-wave to foreign electro, indie rock, baile, balti, booty, club rap, juke, disco, bollywood, dancehall, and whatever else we feel like.
channel.itunes:summary: Hosted by Tyler Fedchuk and Paul Devro we play an international mix of super-fresh weekend party jams from new-wave to foreign electro, indie rock, baile, balti, booty, club rap, juke, disco, bollywood, dancehall, and whatever else we feel like.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver

item.title: Feature with D'marc Cantu + Special Guest Cooper Saver
item.itunes:subtitle: Feature with D'marc Cantu + Special Guest Cooper Saver

item.title: Broadcast on 23-Oct-2009
item.description:
Part 1 - Tyler plays a bunch of old records:
tubeway army - 'me! I disconnect from you" vivien goldman - "launderette" U.K. squeeze - "take me I'm yours" freddie mas - "path" stranglers - "get a grip on yourself" thomas function - "snake in the grass" richard hell & the voidiods - "blank generation" suicide - "dream baby dream" wreckless eric - "whole wide world"
Part 2 - Matt plays some new material:
d-pulse - "more (foto remix)" lemonade - "bliss out (gold panda remix)" doves - "brazil (Aeroplane remix)" priors - "what you need" daniel wang - "like some dream" jackpot - "greased lightning (Rory Phillips remix)" parallels - "find the fire" dasglow - "lite brite - original mix" florence and the machine - "you've got the love (xx remix)" cajmere - "Re Ah Do Da Da Da" excepter - "Shots Ring (Carter Tutti Remix)" end broadcast! <3
item.itunes:subtitle: Tyler and matt bring in a bunch of records
